title: Christmas Burger
instructions: Form the planted into burger patties and season with salt, pepper, and a pinch of nutmeg for festive flavor.
Cook patties in a hot pan with olive oil for 4-5 minutes per side until golden and cooked through.
Prepare cranberry sauce and caramelize onions slowly in butter with a splash of balsamic vinegar.
Toast brioche buns and spread with creamy brie or camembert cheese.
Assemble burgers: bottom bun, arugula, patty, brie, caramelized onions, and cranberry sauce.
Top with the other bun half, secure with a pick, and serve with rosemary-seasoned fries.
